summary: This mod replaces Camilla with a Ranger named Taylor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is working, however it is a work in progress. I will continue to improve on Taylor's looks. In the future I will make her a stand alone companion. However this is my first mod so it may take a little while for some features.

If anybody knows how to change the greeting for a particular NPC please pm me or let me know how to do this in a post. I did find the dialogue menu in the creation kit but its pretty confusing.
____________________________________________________________________________________________
Updates:
v1.1 Taylor now has her own set of vanilla glass armor. I will add a version with the remodeled armor in the near future.

____________________________________________________________________________________________
Installation:
To install simply drop Taylor.esp into your data folder and activate using the NMM. Then click launch.

In order to activate Taylor after the golden claw quest you must open the command console and enter the following lines in this order to turn her into a follower. This is until i can figure out a way to integrate this into the file. You need only do this once so then save.

stopcombat
removefromallfactions
setrelationshiprank player 4
addtofaction 0005a1a4 4
addtofaction 0005c84d 4
setplayerteammate 1

After this is entered you should be able to do the normal follower things with her.
I will be removing her annoying claw related dialogue in a later version.



Required for mod to work:
Apachii Skyhair female standalone v1.3
Caliente's body replacer CBBE v3.2


Recommended:
Cbbe v3.2 Armor replacer by MAK07
author: CrazyLokiCat
